name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.namenode.delegation.key.update-interval
description:
The update interval for master key for delegation tokens 
       in the namenode in milliseconds.

name: dfs.namenode.snapshot.skiplist.max.levels
description:
Maximum no of the skip levels to be maintained in the skip list for
    storing directory snapshot diffs. By default, it is set to 0 and a linear
    list will be used to store the directory snapshot diffs.

name: ha.health-monitor.rpc-timeout.ms
description: Timeout for the actual monitorHealth() calls.

name: hadoop.kerberos.min.seconds.before.relogin
description:
The minimum time between relogin attempts for Kerberos, in
    seconds.

name: mapreduce.job.speculative.retry-after-no-speculate
description:
The waiting time(ms) to do next round of speculation
  if there is no task speculated in this round.

name: dfs.namenode.read-lock-reporting-threshold-ms
description:
When a read lock is held on the namenode for a long time,
    this will be logged as the lock is released. This sets how long the
    lock must be held for logging to occur.
